headline: How Investors May Respond To LKQ (LKQ) Divesting Self Service Segment to Streamline Portfolio and Cut Debt
summary: LKQ Corporation announced it has completed the sale of its Self Service segment ("Pick Your Part") to an affiliate of Pacific Avenue Capital Partners, with plans to use the proceeds for debt repayment and balance sheet improvement. This operational shift means LKQ will now report its Self Service segment as discontinued operations starting with its third quarter 2025 financial results, signaling a significant simplification of its business portfolio. We'll examine how LKQ's portfolio...

headline: Specialized Consumer Services Stocks Q2 Results: Benchmarking LKQ (NASDAQ:LKQ)
summary: Let’s dig into the relative performance of LKQ (NASDAQ:LKQ) and its peers as we unravel the now-completed Q2 specialized consumer services earnings season.
